Name: Bulldozer
About the game: Bulldozer is an action game where the player controls a bulldozer and needs to push off all the barrels of the platform except the bulldozer to win the game. Later levels contain more obstacles like spikes and moving platforms. In other levels there is more vertically and the paths are getting more narrower so you need to be flexible to be able to push off all barrels. Everytime the player successfully wins the level than his/her best time gets saved to the leaderboards. There is a local best time and a leaderboard time where you can compare your score with other player.
